actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a national cemetery within the Manassas National Battlefield Park, Va.

summary.text: Provides for the establishment, by the Secretary of the Army, of a national cemetery within the Manassas National Battlefield Park, Virginia. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as are necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a national cemetery within the Manassas National Battlefield Park, Va.
